This is mine. I added the language stuff to the CSourceViewer. I'm sure I missed something. Thanks.
No probs.  The second one seems to be caused by it not finding the filetype for a weirdly extensioned assembler file.  It works fine for any filetypes defined in Project Properties.

So the two tracebacks are actually totally different problems. The first was due to a bug in the PDOMTypeReference class that helps drive the mapping of types to files for the OpenType dialog. This was also broken in CDT 3.1 so I've submitted the fix to both.

And you are correct about the second one. We weren't handling Context Types that we didn't know about correctly. I have fixed that in HEAD.

Thanks for the great bug report! Your help in debugging this made it pretty easy to understand what was going on.
